Field.Hint: The text that is displayed to the player in a list as a dialogue option.
Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Hi this is Kevin from just now, I am calling to confirm on taking up the loan package that you offered just now. I have couriered in the required documents so can you help me process it as soon as possible? Thanks.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok, noted. I will get it done as soon as I received the documents.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Hi, this is the Facilities Manager. There is a fire in the basement together with the flood that is causing alot of smoke to be created. Please announce to the customers to evacuate to the top floor.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok, noted. I will proceed with the evacuation now.

DialogEntry.UserScript: Item["Evacuation_Notice"].State = "active"; Variable["Alert"] = "There is a new announcement available for you.";

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Notice to all customers, due to the rising water levels, we advise that if you have no urgent matters to be attended today, kindly return on another day. Thank you.

DialogEntry.UserScript: Item["Pre_Flood_Notice"].State = "success"; Variable["Alert"] = "Quest Success: You have given the early warning to the customers. ";

Field.Value: All customers please follow the instructions of the ground staff to evacuate to safety.

DialogEntry.UserScript: Item["Evacuation_Notice"].State = "success"; Variable["Alert"] = "Quest Success: You have evacuated the Sales Floor.";

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Good morning, welcome to ORP Bank. We offer the best deals in town so check out with our sales staff for more information on the latest package we offer here at ORP Bank.

Field.Value: Hi, this is Peter. I am calling to check on the closure of my loan settlement. I have already sent my cheque to you.

Field.Value: My full name is Peter Henderson.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok Sir, I have all the information I need. I will check on the status of your loan settlement and call you back. Will that be alright?

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok, thanks. Please call back as soon as you can.

Note.Text: From here, LPU 1 to call valuer for report and compute credit ratio.

DialogEntry.UserScript: Item["Loan_Enquiry_Peter"].State = "success"; Variable["Alert"] = "Quest Success: You have gathered all the necessary information. ";

Field.Hint: The actor who is talking.

Field.Hint: The actor who is listening.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok Sir, I have all the information I need. I will check on the status of your loan settlement and call you back. Will that be alright?

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: The ground floor is flooded so we were told to move up to this floor.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Title: Sequence

Field.Title: Menu Text

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: I have not received any of notice at all! Can you all kindly move to the conference room for now? Let me find out what has happened.

Field.Hint: A WMV video file to be played for this dialogue.
Field.Title: Video File

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Alright. Where is the conference room located?

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: I am expecting your arrival. Kindly move to the Conference Room and settle down while we wait for further instructions.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Just go straight down either way and take the next turn, the conference room will be located at the end of the corridor.

Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: My full name is Peter Henderson.

Field.Value: Ok Sir, I have all the information I need. I will check on the status of your loan settlement and call you back. Will that be alright?

Field.Value: Hi Sir, your settlement cheque does not match your outstanding amount. Sorry I will not be able to close your account now.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Argh! I must have written the cheque wrongly. I will send you an updated cheque with the correct amount. Can you cross out the cheque I sent over?

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Yeah sure, no problem. Hope to be of service to you again. Bye.

Field.Value: Hi this is ORP Call Centre. How may I help you?

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: This is the Sales Manager of ORP Bank Branch 457. We are experiencing a flood at our Sales Floor and I would like to request a redirect of all calls of the branch to the Call Centre.

Field.Hint: The text that is spoken by the actor.
Field.Title: Dialogue Text
Field.Value: Ok, we will prepare the redirect now. Thank you for the notification.
